mapper.insert: insert into tache_detail (tache_id, flow_id, tache_name, activity_name, tache_desc, tache_spec_cd, tache_type_cd, weight, redispatch ) values ( #{tacheId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tacheName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tacheDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tacheSpecCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tacheTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'N' )

insert into transition_detail(transition_id, trans_name, transition_name, transition_desc, transition_type, from_tache_id, to_tache_id, flow_id, transition_seq) values ( #{transitionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transitionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transitionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transitionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromTacheId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{toTacheId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transitionSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select: select distinct t.key_ as "key", t.name_ as "name" from act_re_procdef t order by t.key_
select t.role_id as "roleId", t.role_name as "roleName" from roles t where t.status_cd='1000' order by t.role_id

select i.name as "staffName", i.staff_id as "staffId" from staff_role re, roles r, staff_info i where re.status_cd = '1000' and r.status_cd = '1000' and i.status_cd = '1000' and re.role_id=r.role_id and re.staff_id=i.staff_id AND r.role_id=#{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into flow_operator (flow_operator, tache_id, operator_type, operator_id, connect_type, is_default, deal_type) values (SEQ_FLOW_OPERATOR.Nextval, #{tacheId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, '1', #{staffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, '1', 0, 1)
mapper.update: update flow_operator set is_default=#{isDefault,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where flow_operator=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
